sentences.en: Because the wisdom is that we know that our life is impermanent.
sentences.cn: 这其中蕴涵的智慧是:我们了知我们的生命是无常的.

sentences.en: Everything impermanent as change is the only constant in nature.
sentences.cn: 凡事变幻无常,唯一不变的自然定律就是“变”!

sentences.en: Human life and the universe continue to mutate constantly and are thought of as essentially impermanent.
sentences.cn: 人生和宇宙生生不息地变迁,被认为是无常之物.

sentences.en: Politics is an impermanent factor of life.
sentences.cn: 政治只是生命中短暂的一部分.

sentences.en: single-storey structures, built from cheap and impermanent materials
sentences.cn: 用廉价而不耐久的材料建成的单层建筑

sentences.en: Something of a shaky or impermanent nature.
sentences.cn: 用于表示一种暂时的、不长久的特性.

sentences.en: The assistant artificial hip joint ( AAHJ ) is a new impermanent hip support implanted in the body.
sentences.cn: 辅助人工髋关节是一种非永久性内置的髋关节支撑器,用于治疗早期股骨头缺血性坏死.

sentences.en: The mind , in fact , is as empty , as impermanent, and as transient as a dream.
sentences.cn: 我们的心其实是空幻的、无常的, 如梦般空虚短暂.

sentences.en: The world is in continuous flux and is impermanent.
sentences.cn: 世界变迁不已,并非是常久不变的.

sentences.en: We are reminded just how small and how impermanent we are.
sentences.cn: 它让我们意识到我们有多么渺小，我们的生命是何其短暂。

sentences.en: Wisdom is mind that understand the truth, the truth is, life impermanent.
sentences.cn: 智慧,是了知真相的心, 而真相就是, 生命无常.

sentences.en: With analysis, we discover that nature in this world of form is impermanent, same as human.
sentences.cn: 认真地分析, 这有色世界的自然界也都是无常的, 其无常之特性也与人类世界中的无常并无二致.

sentences.en: You may say to yourself that they are impermanent, but you perceive them as permanent.
sentences.cn: 你或许对自己说它们“无常”, 但你以“常”认知它们.
